twitch_info.title: I Wanna Tear It - 5 hours - Clear!!!
twitch_info.description:
Pretty fun avoidance, I enjoyed grinding this! Only took a few days to beat.
The first 40 minutes of the time spent on this avoidance are actually from when I played this game back in the day and sucked on it and stopped playing.
Cleared on 15/08/2024.
Time: 5 hours 10 minutes 58 seconds.
Deaths: 998
Description copied from YouTube video on my channel: [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PQMsYFHZpNk](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PQMsYFHZpNk)
